alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson; Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, northwestern Jackson and Kalamazoo Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 514 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kalamazoo, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Richland around 520 AM EDT. Galesburg, Climax and Gull Lake around 525 AM EDT. Battle Creek and Brownlee Park around 535 AM EDT. Marshall around 545 AM EDT. Albion around 600 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Augusta, Springport, Concord, Oshtemo, Marengo, Comstock, Bedford, Ceresco, Scotts and Alamo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
